edu.vt.middleware.ldap.dsml
Class AbstractDsml

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.middleware.ldap.dsml.AbstractDsml
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dsmlv1, Dsmlv2
public abstract class AbstractDsml
extends Object
implements Serializable

AbstractDsml contains functions for converting LDAP search result sets into DSML.

Version:
$Revision: 930 $ $Date: 2009-10-26 16:44:26 -0400 (Mon, 26 Oct 2009) $
Author:
Middleware Services

                                  throws org.dom4j.DocumentException,
                                         IOException

Parameters:
reader - Reader containing DSML content
Returns:
Iterator - of LDAP search results
Throws:
